title: Video: Jagwar Ma – Uncertainty
body:
Taken from their debut album _Howlin’_, Jagwar Ma have just released the video for ‘Uncertainty’.

It finds the Australian group performing behind spacey visuals, alongside a bit of slow-motion jiving and shaking.

The video was filmed by Dave Ma, brother of the band’s Jono, in California’s Mojave desert. Visually, it fits the song well. The pop harmonies and dance-influenced backing morph and build as the video becomes trippier.

‘Uncertainty’ will be released as a single on the 3rd March and you can watch the whole thing below.
